Your 10,000 hours mean nothing if you don't know what you're improving. 

We've all seen it ‚Äî players who train constantly but plateau. The difference? Feedback loops.

Verified times. Measurable progress. Become undeniable.

plannedPosts.caption:
New week. New baseline. Same goal: Become undeniable. 

What metric are you improving this week?

6 weeks to Easter Classic. The ARC, Campbelltown. 

Will your players show up with verified combine data ‚Äî or just hope they're ready?

Training tip: Track the boring stuff. 

Everyone posts highlights. But improvement happens in the reps nobody sees. 

The 100 free throws after practice. The 50 sprints when you're already tired. The footwork drills that feel unnecessary ‚Äî until they save you on defense.
